products.title: Adventures in Dream State
products.body_html:
“Adulting” is tough. From college debt to creepy dating app messages, the millennial in our story has a lot on their mind, and there's only one thing that can take them to a state of relaxation - a Dream State. With illustrations by NYC-based artist, Amber Vittoria, “Adventures in Dream State” is the perfect, lighthearted gift this holiday season, for the millennial in your life.

  • This light-hearted tome is packed with 37 pages of tongue-in-cheek commentary on millennial life.
  • Fantastic illustrations from NYC-based artist, Amber Vittoria, adorn every page.
  • With a vibrant hard cover, this book is tailor-made to grace your coffee table.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

products.title: Calm X Gravity: Original Blanket
products.body_html:
The Gravity calming weighted blanket is no regular heavy blanket. Our customers say that it is the best weighted blanket for those dealing with autism, ADHD, and sleep disorders. It’s also a best seller for those who deal with panic attacks or other anxiety disorders. The calming effect produced by a weighted blanket has been shown to improve mental health and certain health conditions. Get this luxurious, science-backed weighted blanket engineered to be approximately 10% of your body weight (see Detailed Sizing Guide here).

These removable duvet covers are made of high-quality breathable fabric and machine washable. You can order Gravity weighted blanket covers in multiple fabrics and styles, including soft breathable cotton and microfiber fabrics.

  • The Calm X Gravity Blanket is available in our single size (72” x 48”) and comes with a duvet cover in a gradient of Calm blue.
  • Each weighted blanket features a premium micro-plush duvet cover and an inner weighted piece containing plastic pellets.
  • Precise gridded stitching ensures the plastic pellets provide even weight distribution, resulting in better sleep for even the biggest toss-and-turners.
  • Two types of internal clasps (ties and elastic-button connectors) secure the inner weighted blanket inside the duvet cover.
  • The micro-plush duvet cover is not only ultra-soft but also removable, making cleaning a stress-free experience. 
  • Please note! The duvet cover is machine washable (wash in cold water, tumble dry on low), while the inner weighted blanket is hand-wash-only and air dry.
  • Purchase of this weighted blanket INCLUDES a one-year subscription to the Calm App, the #1 app for better sleep, meditation, and relaxation. Info on how to redeem this subscription will be included in the weighted blanket box.

For more information on the partnership, visit our FAQ here.

    *Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

featured_image.alt: Blue Calm and Gravity Original weighted blanket
Blue Calm and Gravity Original weighted blanket
Blue Calm and Gravity Original weighted blanket

products.title: Calm X Gravity: Travel Blanket
products.body_html:
• A luxurious, therapeutic 10lb weighted blanket.
  • The Calm X Gravity Travel Blanket is six inches smaller (66” x 48”) than our traditional Blanket and available in the signature Calm blue.
  • The exceptional carrying case (22" x 9" x 9") makes transportation simple, and it sits snugly atop most rolling suitcases.
  • Each blanket features a premium duvet cover made of a breathable technical fabric designed to wick moisture, and an inner weighted piece containing fine-grade glass beads.
  • Precise gridded stitching ensures the glass beads remain uniformly distributed, providing comfort for even the biggest toss-and-turners.
  • Two types of internal clasps (ties and elastic-button connectors) secure the inner weighted blanket inside the duvet.
  • The 100% breathable polyester cover excels in all climates and makes cleanup a stress-free experience!
  • INCLUDES a one-year subscription to the Calm App, the #1 app for sleep, meditation and relaxation.
  • Please note! The cover is machine washable (wash in cold water, tumble dry on low), while the inner weighted blanket is hand-wash-only and air dry.

For more information on the partnership, visit our FAQ here.

*Free shipping on US orders only.

products.title: Calm X Gravity: Weighted Sleep Mask
products.body_html:
• The patented design distributes between .75 and 1 lb. of weighted pressure.
  • Mask is made with our signature micro-plush and luxurious imitation cashmere, in Calm purple.
  • The weighted insert is filled with the same fine-grade glass beads as our flagship Gravity Blankets.
  • An adjustable velcro strap (23-32 in.) guarantees that any sleeper can benefit from our mask.
  • INCLUDES a 60-day subscription to the Calm App, the #1 app for sleep, meditation and relaxation. Redemption instructions to be provided in order confirmation email.
  • Please note! We recommend washing the mask by hand in warm water, as it is not intended to be machine-washed. Once washed, leave out to air dry.

For more information on the partnership, visit our FAQ here.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

products.title: Cooling Blanket
products.body_html:
Do you often wake up in the middle of the night, sweaty and uncomfortable? Do you wish you could stay cool during hot summer nights without air conditioning? Would you like to own an ultra-soft, breathable blanket, but still get all the benefits of our science-backed Gravity Blankets? Our Cooling Blanket has you covered (literally!). Available in the same size and colors as our signature Gravity Blanket, our Cooling Blanket features a revolutionary moisture-wicking fabric designed for breathability and specifically for hot sleepers. Hot sleepers can experience the benefits of a heavy blanket and temperature regulation at the same time. 

Gravity has the best cooling blanket and nothing’s cozier than a stress-free night that’s also sweat-free!

  • A luxurious, therapeutic weighted cooling comforter that features a revolutionary breathable fabric, helping to wick away moisture during use and leaving you feeling rejuvenated. 
  • The Cooling Weighted Blanket is available in a single size (72” x 48”, 15-20-25lbs) and Queen or King (90" x 90", 35lbs). When purchasing a single, we recommend choosing an option that's about 10% of your body weight (see Detailed Sizing Guide here).
  • The Cooling Blanket comes in three modern neutrals (Grey, Navy, or White). Perfect for the bed or couch, in any decor!
  • Each blanket features a premium duvet cover made of a breathable material designed to wick moisture and control body temperature. The inner weighted piece contains fine-grade glass beads that are hypoallergenic.
  • Precise gridded stitching ensures the glass beads remain uniformly distributed, making Gravity the best weighted blanket and cooling comforter on the market.
  • The weighted inner is secured to the duvet cover via ties and elastic-button connectors in our Generation 2 blankets and with our upgraded zipper fastening system in Generation 3 blankets.
  • The breathable blanket cover is not only super soft but also easily removable, making cleaning a stress-free experience.  
  • Please note! The cover is machine washable (wash in cold water, tumble dry on low), while the inner weighted blanket is hand-wash-only and air dry.

    *Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

products.title: Duvet Covers (Single Size)
products.body_html:
Do you already own one of our popular Gravity Weighted Blankets with microbeads and need additional removable covers for your weighted blanket? Now you can customize your sleep style with a brand-new weighted blanket cover from Gravity! These high-quality duvet covers come in all our classic colors as well as fresh new patterns and are guaranteed to revitalize any room. 

Gravity Weighted Blankets offer even weight distribution via micro-beds in a quilted duvet. This weighted inner is then covered by a removable duvet cover available in microfiber, soft cotton fabric, or polyester blends. 

These removable duvet covers are made of high-quality fabric and machine washable. You can order Gravity weighted blanket covers in multiple fabrics and styles, including soft cotton and microfiber fabrics.

  • These removable covers are fitted for our single-sized weighted blankets (72" x 48") and work with our Gen 1 and 2 weighted blankets that feature button/tie connectors. We do not currently sell separate duvet covers for our Queen Size or King Size Blankets, and these duvet covers do not work with our Gen 3 (zipper closure) weighted inners.
  • The original micro-plush weighted blanket cover comes in Grey, Navy, or Ivory (100% polyester). It is a washable cover that can be easily thrown in the washing machine.
  • The cooling duvet cover (first-generation) is available in our flagship Grey (a breathable poly-spandex blend). This cover is perfect for hot sleepers.
  • The gorgeous Vineyard Brush, Sea Shore Stripe, and Midnight Iceberg are all made of a cooling polyester fabric that's 100% breathable and wicks away moisture from the body during use.
  • The luxurious Sand Linen cotton cover is made of a premium linen-cotton fabric mix (10% linen, 90% cotton).
  • All duvet covers are removable and machine-washable for easy cleanup. Please read the care instructions before washing.
  • Please note! This item is the duvet cover only and does not include the weighted inner piece of a Gravity Blanket. This is ONLY the removable duvet cover.

In addition to our weighted blanket covers, Gravity also sells sherpa throw blankets and other items. Our customers say Gravity Blanket is the best-weighted blanket on the market and perfect for those with autism, ADHD, anxiety disorders, or for anyone desiring a better night’s sleep.

*Free shipping for US orders only.

**Note on Duvet Cover Compatibility: Over the years, we've added additional buttons and ties to our duvet covers and weighted blankets. This means your weighted blanket cover may not have the same number of fasteners as your weighted inner, depending on when you ordered it. The duvet cover will have the proper attachments in each corner and in the middle of the longer sides of the blanket, securing it in place. Thus, this weighted blanket cover is compatible with all Gen 1 and Gen 2 weighted inners but it is not compatible with our Gen 3 zipper blankets. Learn more here.

products.title: Faux Fur Duvet Covers
products.body_html:
Already have one of our popular Gravity Blankets? Customize your sleep style with our Faux Fur Duvet Cover – it combines softness with beauty, making it the perfect accent piece for any room.

  • The Faux Fur Duvet Cover is fitted for our single-sized blankets (72" x 48"), and work with our Gen 1 and 2 blankets that feature button/tie connectors. We do not currently sell separate duvet covers for our Queen / King Blankets, and these duvet covers do not work with our Gen 3 (zipper) weighted inners.
  • The duvet cover is now available in 2 colors: an elegant and ultramodern Grey and tasteful and sophisticated solid White.
  • One side is a plush, synthetic fur, while the other side contains a smooth, velvet-y lining.
  • Features button connectors and ties to keep the inner weighted piece secure inside the Faux Fur duvet cover.
  • This cover is dry clean only!
  • Please note! This item does not include the weighted inner piece of a Gravity Blanket. This is ONLY the duvet cover.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

**Note on Duvet Cover Compatibility: Over the years, we've added additional buttons and ties to our duvet covers and blankets. This means your duvet cover may not have the same amount as on your weighted inner, depending on when you ordered it. The duvet cover will have the proper attachments in each corner and in the middle of the longer sides of the blanket, securing it in place. Thus, this cover is compatible with all Gen 1 and Gen 2 weighted inners but it is not compatible with our Gen 3 zipper blankets. Learn more here.

products.title: Flannel Duvet Covers
products.body_html:
The Modernist X Gravity Flannel Collection features super soft and cozy flannel duvet covers (100% cotton) in 3 new, custom-designed patterns made by Modernist's Ron Chereskin. This new Flannel collection is available for a limited time, so order while supplies last.

  • This collection features 3 new, custom-designed patterns in super soft and cozy flannel material (100% cotton). Patterns are Grey Plaid, Red Plaid and Blue Stripe.
  • This collection of duvet covers is available in Single (72” x 48”) and Queen/King (90” x 90”) dimensions. 
  • Please note this product does not include the weighted inner - it is only the outer duvet cover.
  • Duvet cover is machine washable.

About Modernist & Ron Chereskin:
Award-winning artist and designer Ron Chereskin serves as founding designer at Modernist Studios. His brilliant legacy in fashion, art and design help foster a creative attitude towards patterns, colors and textures that beautify any home. For combining innovative applications of cotton fiber with beautiful textures, patterns and breadth of color - an approach that would become Ron’s trademark - he received both the Coty and Cutty Sark awards for understanding design.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders will ship after 11/17/20.

products.title: Flannel Weighted Blanket
products.body_html:
The Modernist x Gravity Flannel Weighted Blanket Collection features the signature Gravity Weighted Blanket with a super soft and cozy flannel duvet cover (100% cotton) in 3 new, custom-designed patterns made by Modernist's Ron Chereskin. This new collection of Flannel Weighted Blankets is available for a limited time, so order while supplies last.

  • This collection features 3 new, custom-designed patterns in super soft and cozy flannel material (100% cotton).
  • Blankets are available in two sizes: Single (72" x 48" and weighing 15lbs) and Queen/King (90" x 90" and weighing 35lbs).
  • All weighted inners use fine-grade glass beads for weight. Precise gridded stitching ensures the glass beads remain uniformly distributed, providing comfort, no matter how you use your Blanket.
  • Our new zipper fastening system is used to secure the weighted inner to the duvet cover, ensuring a seamless fastening experience and no pooling during use.
  • Please note! The duvet cover should be machine washed in cold water with like colors. Use neutral detergent, do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Weighted inner is hand wash only.

About Modernist & Ron Chereskin:
Award-winning artist and designer Ron Chereskin serves as founding designer at Modernist Studios. His brilliant legacy in fashion, art and design help foster a creative attitude towards patterns, colors and textures that beautify any home. For combining innovative applications of cotton fiber with beautiful textures, patterns and breadth of color - an approach that would become Ron’s trademark - he received both the Coty and Cutty Sark awards for understanding design.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders will ship after 11/17/20.

products.title: Flannel-Sherpa Weighted Throw
products.body_html:
Meet Gravity's very first weighted throw! This high-quality sherpa/flannel weighted blanket sets the mood for restful sleep during snowy nights. The cozy throw features exactly what you love about Gravity: weighted sleep with a luxurious feel.


The Gravity weighted blanket throw simulates body weight and gives you the feeling of being snuggled or hugged. This “heavy blanket” has just the right amount of deep pressure to give you feelings of calmness and security and leading to more restful sleep. The Gravity Weighted throw blanket is a best-seller for those with ADHD or autism.

  • This comfy and festive weighted blanket weighs approximately 10 lbs and comes in a single size of 72” x 48” (just like the best weighted blanket on the market, our single-sized Gravity Blankets!).
  • One side of this weighted blanket contains an incredibly soft sherpa fabric while the other side of the throw features a gorgeous flannel pattern, perfect for any home decor. Use it in the bedroom, the living room, or take it on the go.
  • Unique from our Gravity Blankets, the Flannel-Sherpa Throw is only ONE piece, instead of a duo of the duvet cover and inner weighted piece.
  • Precise gridded stitching ensures the glass beads remain uniformly distributed, providing comfort, no matter how you use your throw. 
  • Please note that while the Gravity Weighted Throw Blanket is a washable cover, we do not recommend machine washing this weighted blanket. Instead, we recommend spot cleaning or hand washing your Flannel-Sherpa Throw in cold water with like colors only. Hang dry - do not dry in your dryer. Please do not machine wash, iron, or use bleach on this product.

    *Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

products.title: Gravity Bamboo Sheets
products.body_html:
Gravity’s new line of bamboo-cotton sheets are the perfect choice for upgrading your bed and elevating your sleep. Made of a special blend of bamboo and cotton, our sheets are incredibly soft, cool to the touch, and have moisture-wicking properties that help keep you comfortable in warmer sleeping conditions.

  • Gravity Sheets are available in full, queen and king sets – with each set including a fitted sheet, top sheet, and two pillowcases.
  • The deep-pocket fitted sheet fits mattresses 12-inches or higher, with elastic corner bands on it preventing shifting or pulling during use.
  • All sheets are 300 thread count, and come in 4 colors - silver, white, cream, and navy.
  • Naturally breathable and cooling, moisture wicking, and hypoallergenic.
  • Gravity Sheets are made of bamboo, which tends to perform better than other fibers when it comes to odors and has natural deodorizing and antimicrobial properties. Bamboo is also very sustainable as a crop. It’s a fast-growing grass that requires no fertilizer and self-regenerates from its own roots, making it a more eco-friendly material.
  • Please note: for ongoing care, machine wash in cold water with like colors on gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Iron on low if desired. Do not dry clean.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

products.title: Gravity Blanket
products.body_html:
Simulating the feeling of being held (like a hug!), Gravity Blankets utilize the power of weight to relax the nervous system. This revolutionary and science-backed method is called “deep touch pressure stimulation.” You’ll achieve faster and deeper sleep as our Gravity Blanket revives key pressure points.

  • A luxurious, therapeutic weighted blanket that's designed to help improve sleep and reduce stress. 
  • The Gravity Blanket is available in a single size (72” x 48”, 15-20-25lbs) and Queen/King (90" x 90", 35lbs). When purchasing a single, we recommend choosing an option that's about 10% of your body weight (see Detailed Sizing Guide here).
  • This weighted blanket comes in a selection of three modern neutrals (Grey, Navy, or White). Perfect for the bed or couch, in any decor!
  • Each blanket features a premium micro-plush duvet cover and an inner weighted piece containing fine-grade glass beads.
  • Precise gridded stitching ensures the glass beads remain uniformly distributed, providing comfort, no matter how you use your weighted blanket.
  • The weighted inner is secured to the duvet cover via ties and elastic-button connectors in our Generation 2 weighted blankets and with our upgraded zipper fastening system in Generation 3 blankets.
  • The ultra soft duvet cover is not only super soft but also easily removable, making cleaning a stress-free experience.  
  • Please note! The cover is machine washable (wash in cold water, tumble dry on low), while the inner weighted blanket is hand-wash-only and air dry.
*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

products.title: Gravity Ice Hybrid Mattress
products.body_html:
Designed to be used with or without the Gravity Blanket, Gravity Ice Hybrid capitalizes on the growing trend of coil-foam combination design to provide you with a comfortable and well-supported night of sleep, each and every night.

  • The use of coils prevents your mattress from dipping or sagging during use – gently cradling the body for much needed support to your hips and key spinal points, while still remaining extremely soft from the memory foam.
  • The coils also help the mattress keep its shape, providing you with many more years of use compared to pure memory foam mattresses, which lose shape over time. 
  • The coil-foam combo increases airflow throughout the mattress, keeping you cooler  than a traditional, heat-trapping memory foam mattress.
  • With a top layer of cooling gel, get an extra cooling sensation all night long. No expensive or noisy motors attached to the bed like some cooling mattresses!
  • Pair with our Gravity Blanket for the trifecta of sleep excellence: deep touch pressure on top of you for increased relaxation, foam/coil hybrid below you for gentle support, and a cooling gel layer between them both to regulate your temperature all night long.
  • Available in three sizes (Full, Queen and King) to provide sweet dreams no matter your bed size.

All Ice Hybrid Mattresses come with:

  1. Free Shipping
  2. 100-Day Return Policy (see here)
  3. 10-Year Limited Warranty (see here)

products.title: Gravity Kids
products.body_html:
If your kids are struggling with stress or not getting proper sleep each night, Gravity Kids is here to help. It provides the same stress-reducing and sleep-enhancing benefits as our world famous blanket but in a safe format for children ages 7 and up. Your child will look forward to bedtime every night with Gravity Kids.

  • A luxurious, therapeutic 10lb weighted blanket and 3lb weighted toy, designed specifically for kids ages 7 and up.
  • Gravity Kids Blanket is sized 66” x 42” and is available in two colors: green and pink.
  • Each Blanket comes with a weighted dog toy, providing extra snuggles for your little one throughout the night.
  • The outer duvet cover is made of our 100% polyester cooling fabric, which wicks moisture away during use and ensures a lightweight, breathable experience in any climate. 
  • The inner weighted blanket contains fine-grade glass beads for weight, and precise gridded stitching ensures the glass beads remain uniformly distributed during use.
  • Two types of internal clasps (ties and elastic-button connectors) secure the inner weighted blanket inside the duvet cover.
  • Please note! The cover is machine washable (wash in cold water, tumble dry on low), making any spill or stain a breeze. The inner weighted blanket is hand-wash only and air dry. Weighted dog toy is spot clean only – do not machine wash.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

featured_image.alt: Pink Gravity Kids Blanket with Weighted Dog Toy
Green Gravity Kids Blanket with Weighted Dog Toy

products.title: Gravity Pillow
products.body_html:
The premium softness of shredded memory foam combined with the luxe Bamboo-based cover makes the Gravity Pillow a one-of-a-kind item in your sleep toolkit.

  • The queen-sized pillow (30” x 20”) is fully customizable to your desired firmness, thanks to a generous amount of removable inner fill. 
  • Select either 100% shredded memory foam or a NEW 50/50 combination of shredded memory foam and cotton for your inner fill – two great options for a night of soothing rest.
  • Our premium Bamboo-based pillow cover keeps both sides of the pillow cool, helping you feel fresh for an invigorating night's sleep.

For care instructions, please see here.

    *Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

featured_image.alt: White Gravity Pillow on white background.
White Gravity Pillow on white background.

products.title: Gravity Travel
products.body_html:
Whether you’re relaxing on vacation or de-stressing during a work trip, the Gravity Travel is the perfect blanket for all your globe-trotting needs. Featuring a smaller, compact size and high-quality carrying case, the Gravity Travel is ready to be your “hug on the road.”

  • A luxurious, therapeutic 10lb weighted blanket.
  • The Gravity Travel is six inches smaller (66” x 42”) than our traditional Gravity Blanket and available in our signature Grey color.
  • The exceptional carrying case (22" x 9" x 9") makes transportation simple, and it sits comfortably atop large rolling suitcases.
  • Each blanket features a premium duvet cover made of a breathable technical fabric designed to wick moisture and an inner weighted piece containing fine-grade glass beads.
  • Precise gridded stitching ensures the glass beads remain uniformly distributed, providing comfort, no matter how you use your Blanket.
  • Two types of internal clasps (ties and elastic-button connectors) secure the inner weighted blanket inside the duvet cover.
  • The 100% breathable polyester cover excels in all climates and makes cleanup a stress-free experience!
  • Please note! The cover is machine washable (wash in cold water, tumble dry on low), while the inner weighted blanket is hand-wash-only and air dry.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

products.title: Higher Dose Infrared Sauna Blanket
products.body_html:
Take a wellness cue from the likes of celebrities world wide and take your DOSE on the go.Perfect for traveling or at-home use, our Infrared Sauna Blankets increase the body’s thermal energy and promote a temporary increase in blood flow – so you sweat like you’re working out, without working out.

As you relax into the soothing, yet stimulating heat, infrared also provides an uplifting sensation. The result? A healthy, rejuvenating experience that leaves you feeling euphoric.

Product Specifications:

  • Heat Zones: One heating zone
  • Display: 1-9 level
  • Control:White color handle held controller
  • Voltage: 100-120 Volt (US/Canada model); 220v (UK/EU models)
  • Wattage: 350-420 Watts
  • Amps: 4-5 Amps
  • Timer Settings: 1 hour
  • Electrical Field:Low EMF
  • Warranty:  One-Year limited warranty. See details here.
  • Size:  71 x 71 inches (180 x 180 cm), unfolded. Maximum interior circumference when in use is approximately 65 inches (165 cm)

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

*Partner products, like this one, are not eligible for our discounts/offer at this time.

products.title: Modernist X Gravity Cotton Duvet Covers
products.body_html:
The Modernist X Gravity Cotton Collection, designed by Ron Chereskin, brings together one of fashion's most prolific designers with our signature weighted blankets that have revolutionized how we think about sleep. Our first collection is limited, so order today while supplies last.

  • The collection features 6 new, custom-designed patterns to add some style to your sleep game. 
  • All duvet covers in this line are 100% cotton, 300 thread count - meaning they’re built for breathability, durability, and comfort.
  • This collection of duvet covers is available in Single (72” x 48”) and Queen/King (90” x 90”) dimensions. 
  • Please note! The cover is machine washable, while the inner weighted blanket is hand-wash-only.

About Modernist & Ron Chereskin:
Award-winning artist and designer Ron Chereskin serves as founding designer at Modernist Studios. His brilliant legacy in fashion, art and design help foster a creative attitude towards patterns, colors and textures that beautify any home. For combining innovative applications of cotton fiber with beautiful textures, patterns and breadth of color - an approach that would become Ron’s trademark - he received both the Coty and Cutty Sark awards for understanding design.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

products.title: Modernist X Gravity Cotton Weighted Blanket
products.body_html:
The Modernist X Gravity Cotton Collection, designed by Ron Chereskin, pairs the distinguished designs of Chereskin with the scientifically-proven Gravity weighted blanket. Our signature weighted blankets have revolutionized how we think about sleep. Our first collection of cotton weighted blankets is limited, so order today while supplies last.

  • This collection of cotton weighted blankets features 6 new, custom-designed patterns to add some style to your sleep game
  • Gravity Cotton Blankets are available in two sizes: Single (72" x 48" and weighing 15lbs) and Queen/King (90" x 90" and weighing 35lbs).
  • All duvet covers in this line are 100% cotton, 300 thread count - meaning they’re built for breathability, durability, and comfort.
  • All weighted inners use fine-grade glass beads for weight. Precise gridded stitching ensures the glass beads remain uniformly distributed, providing even weight distribution no matter how you use your weighted blanket.
  • Two types of internal clasps (ties and elastic-button connectors) secure the inner weighted blanket inside the duvet cover.
  • Please note! The cover is machine washable, while the inner weighted blanket is hand-wash-only.

About Modernist & Ron Chereskin:
Award-winning artist and designer Ron Chereskin serves as founding designer at Modernist Studios. His brilliant legacy in fashion, art and design help foster a creative attitude towards patterns, colors and textures that beautify any home. For combining innovative applications of cotton fiber with beautiful textures, patterns and breadth of color - an approach that would become Ron’s trademark - he received both the Coty and Cutty Sark awards for understanding design.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

products.title: Modernist X Gravity Flannel Sheets
products.body_html:
Our flannel bed sheets will upgrade any bedroom. Cozy, stylish, and affordably priced, they are the perfect gift this holiday season.

You won’t believe the difference a set of flannel sheets makes during cold winter nights. Snuggle into our soft, cozy flannel sheets and sleep like a baby, warm and secure.

Gravity Flannel Sheets are not just comfortable, they are also stylish. Upgrade your bedroom decor with one or more of our exclusive patterns, designed by Modernist for Gravity.  

Made of 100% cotton, our brushed flannel sheets are machine washable for easy care.

  • Modernist X Gravity Flannel Sheets are available in full, queen, and king sheet sets – with each set including a fitted sheet, flat sheet, and two pillowcases.
  • The deep-pocket fitted sheet fits mattresses 12-inches or higher, with elastic corner bands on it preventing shifting or pulling during use.
  • All sheets are 100% cotton and come in 4 colors - Grey Plaid, Red Plaid, Penguins, and Blue Stripe.
  • Machine wash with like colors in warm water. Only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low. Remove promptly from the dryer. Wash before first use.

 

About Modernist & Ron Chereskin:

Award-winning artist and designer Ron Chereskin serves as a founding designer at Modernist Studios. His brilliant legacy in fashion, art, and design help foster a creative attitude towards patterns, colors, and textures that beautify any home.

For combining innovative applications of cotton fiber with beautiful textures, patterns, and breadth of color - an approach that would become Ron’s trademark - he received both the Coty and Cutty Sark awards for understanding design.

products.title: Modernist X Gravity Weighted Robe
products.body_html:
The power of the Gravity Blanket, now in robe form! Our collaboration with Modernist brings the power of weight from the world-famous Gravity Blanket and marries it with the robe, a fashion staple that’s synonymous with relaxation. Meet the Modernist x Gravity Weighted Robe.

  • Three pound (3lb) weighted wrap inside the collar helps harness the power of deep touch pressure stimulation to promote stress reduction and relaxation – just like the Gravity Blanket. 
  • Available in three modern neutrals (Grey, Navy, White) and 3 sizes (Small, Medium, Large).
  • Made of 100% polyester fleece, making it incredibly soft and cozy.
  • Precise gridded stitching on the weighted inner ensures the glass beads remain uniformly distributed during use.
  • The weighted inner can be removed via a zipper on the underside of the robe’s collar, allowing the robe to be worn with and without weight, and making cleaning a breeze!
  • Please note! For on-going care, the robe is machine-washable with like colors in warm water. Remove the weighted inner before washing. Weighted inner is hand wash/spot clean only.
*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

featured_image.alt: White Robe folded.
White Robe folded.
White Robe folded.

products.title: Objective X Gravity Dream Skin Night Serum
products.body_html:
Get your beauty sleep, and wake up to better looking skin with Dream Skin – the new night serum by Gravity and Objective.

  • Each bottle is 30 mL (1 fl. oz).
  • The formula contains 4 key ingredients (Bakuchiol, Squalane, Lavender Essential Oil, and Abyssinian Oil) that each provide a key benefit.
  • BAKUCHIOL: This natural retinol alternative derived from the babchi plant gently renews your skin overnight for smoother, softer, brighter skin.
  • SQUALANE: Extracted from sugar cane, squalene hydrates your skin while you sleep.
  • LAVENDER ESSENTIAL OIL: One of aromatherapy’s best-loved tools for relaxation, lavender helps you relax and fall into a restful sleep.
  • ABYSSINIAN OIL: Derived from the seeds of the Crambe abyssinica plant, this oil provides a silky serum base.
  • Application: Apply 3 drops of serum to the tips of fingers and massage over clean face, neck and eye area. Allow to be fully absorbed. Follow with moisturizer, if desired. 
  • Note: If you have sensitive skin, test a small amount on the inside of your wrist prior to using.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather. Shipping starts after 11/17.

**Partner products, like this one, are not eligible for our discounts/offer at this time.

products.title: Six Steps to Anxiety Management Course
products.body_html:
Designed to help you manage your anxiety on a day-to-day basis, this course is brought to you by a partnership Calmist, a California-based company that focuses on stress, sleep, and anxiety solutions.

  • The course is hosted by renowned wellness and anxiety coach, Amanda Huggins.
  • Clocking in at 25 minutes, “Six Steps” is practical and succinct (nothing too crunchy!), focusing on easy-to-follow steps to identify and analyze your triggers, while providing ways to cope and move forward.
  • Amanda shares anecdotes and examples from her real life, creating a course that’s relatable and conversational.

    ﻿*This product is non-refundable once purchased.

products.title: The Original Pan Weighted Blanket
products.body_html:
Simulating the feeling of eating a legendary thick Original Pan® pizza from Pizza Hut, the Original Pan Weighted Blanket by Pizza Hut x Gravity Blanket will bring comfort to your entire body. Combining the power of the revolutionary, science-backed “deep touch pressure stimulation” with the delectable design of the Original Pan Pizza, you'll achieve deeper sleep and may even have some pizza cravings.

  • A luxurious, therapeutic weighted blanket that's designed to help improve sleep and will probably also make you really hungry.
  • The Original Pan Weighted Blanket is available in extra, extra, extra, extra, extra-large also known as Queen/King (72" diameter, 15lbs).
  • This weighted blanket comes in cheese and pepperoni. Perfect for the bed or couch, table or in any decor!
  • Each blanket features a premium micro-plush duvet cover and an inner weighted piece containing fine-grade glass beads. Caution: Though the blanket looks like pizza, there is not actual pizza inside. BUT, never hesitate to order your pizza separately at pizzahut.com
  • Precise gridded stitching ensures the glass beads remain uniformly distributed, like a perfectly sliced pizza, providing comfort every time.
  • The ultra-soft duvet cover is not only super soft but also easily removable, making cleaning a stress-free experience, especially after you get cheese, tomato sauce and crumbs all over it.
  • Please note! The cover is machine washable (wash in cold water, tumble dry on low), while the inner weighted blanket is hand-wash-only and air dry. Also, Pizza Hut pizza is not machine washable.

Limited time only while supplies last. Free shipping for US only. Orders begin shipping in late December. Orders typically received within 5-7 days in contiguous US pending weather. Gravity discount codes not applicable to Original Pan Weighted Blanket orders.

products.title: Weighted Sleep Mask
products.body_html:
Our Weighted Sleep Mask uses the same science behind our Gravity Blankets to give your face the perfect pressure stimulation. It also blocks out light and feels amazing, thanks to a combination of micro-plush and imitation cashmere. 

  • The patented design distributes between .75 and 1 lb. of weighted pressure to key pressure points on the face – on areas surrounding the eyes tied to relaxation.
  • Mask is made with our signature micro-plush and luxurious imitation cashmere.
  • The weighted insert is filled with the same fine-grade glass beads as our flagship Gravity Blankets.
  • An adjustable velcro strap (23-28 in.) guarantees that any sleeper can benefit from our mask.
  • Please note! We recommend washing the mask by hand in warm water, as it is not intended to be machine-washed. Once washed, leave out to air dry.
  • This product is protected by U.S. Patent No. 10,426,666.

For hygienic reasons, this product is non-returnable and non-refundable. See our full Return Policy here.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on weather.

products.title: Z by Gravity Weighted Throw
products.body_html:
Take your relaxation up a notch with a Z by Gravity Weighted Throw. Made with a seasonal flannel (Buffalo Check or Tartan) on one side and cozy sherpa on the other, these throws give you weighted sleep and relaxation you love about Gravity, but with a luxurious look and feel that’s perfect for those crisp fall nights.

  • This comfy and festive throw weighs approximately 10 lbs. and comes in a single size of 66” x 48”.
  • One side contains an incredibly soft, beige sherpa fabric, while the other side features a gorgeous seasonal pattern, either red Buffalo Check or a green/blue Tartan.
  • This Z by Gravity Throw is ONE piece, instead of 2 pieces (duvet cover and weighted inner) like other Z by Gravity and Gravity products.
  • Precise gridded stitching ensures the glass beads remain uniformly distributed, providing comfort, no matter how you use your throw.
  • Please note that we recommend spot cleaning or hand washing your Z by Gravity Throw in cold water. Do not machine wash. Hang dry - do not dry in your dryer.

*Free shipping for US orders only. Orders typically received within 5-7 days if ordering within the continental US, depending on the weather.
